title: Red Hot Holiday
description: I’ll be home for Christmas…to fulfill all your dreams. This holiday, a Mountie is determined to get her man. A widow finds a fireman who ignites her passions again. And two men unsure of their commitment discover a happily ever after—and a blindfold—under their tree. No matter your desires, this collection of three shorts is bound to treat you to all the joys of the season. Edited by Angela James, this anthology includes: I Need You for Christmas by Leah BraemelBreath on Embers by Annie CalhounWish List by K.A. Mitchell99,000 words
author: Anne Calhoun
